SignUp and SignIn to Bucketify detail:
You can use a social accounts to sign up Bucketify such as Google, Facebook, Amazon.

Scan your bucket detail: Enter your bucket name, access key, and secret access key, and Hit a Scan Bucket button.

Introduction detail:
Bucketify is a cloud music player.
This makes you can play your favorite music stored in Amazon S3 anytime, anywhere.

It is FREE TO USE.
You have to pay only billing of your AWS accounts such as S3 storage or Network transfer.
Streaming playback detail:
Makes you can streaming playback your favorite music in s3 bucket. 
It is also can mobile background playing.
Auto generated libraries detail:
Generates libraries by tracks, artist(ðŸš§), album(ðŸš§).
Allowed file extensions are only 'mp3' or 'm4a'.
Playlists stored on the cloud detail: Makes you can store playlists on the cloud, and play on any device, anytime, anywhere.
How It Works detail: Bucketify manages only your audio file metadata.
Privacy Policy detail:
Last updated: 2021-04-29

I operate http://www.bucketify.net (the 'Bucketify'). This section informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information we receive from users of Bucketify.

I use your Personal Information only for providing and improving Bucketify. By using Bucketify, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

Error message audio not found:
No audio file was found.
File extensions that you can use in bucketify are only 'mp3','m4a' .
Please confirm that your object is exists and file extension is allowed.
Deleting metadata in Bucketify about $bu: Deleting metadata in Bucketify about bucketName...
Error message loading failed:
An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again.
If it wouldn't be resolved, please open the issue on GitHub.
Please select tracks at least one: Please select tracks at least one.
Error message InvalidAccessKey: Check your access key is correct.
Error message SignatureDoesNotMatch: The request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided.  Check your secret access key is correct.
Error message NetworkError:
Check your s3 bucket is exists.
Need to allow Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) setting in your buckets.

Like below:

[
{
"AllowedHeaders": [
"*"
],
"AllowedMethods": [
"GET"
],
"AllowedOrigins": [
"https://www.bucketify.net"
],
"ExposeHeaders": []
}
]
CORS setting may take a few minutes to be enabled.
Error message AccessDenied:
Need to attach policy to allow ListBucket and GetItem oparation.

Like below:

{
"Version": "2012-10-17",
"Statement": [
{
"Sid": "VisualEditor0",
"Effect": "Allow",
"Action": [
"s3:ListBucket",
"s3:ListBucketVersions",
"s3:GetObject"
],
"Resource": [
"arn:aws:s3:::your-bucket-name",
"arn:aws:s3:::your-bucket-name/*",
]
}
]
}
